995380.name: Miscreated - Iron Sons' Cache
995380.description:
Entrada Interactive and the entire Miscreated team thanks you for your continued support of Miscreated! The Iron Sons' Cache will provide you with the following extra content:

Exclusive Weapon Skins

Display your Iron Sons' pride by using any of the over 50 included exclusive weapon skins in Miscreated!


To apply any of the exclusive skins to your weapon, just visit any Amalgamated kiosk in the game and they will be displayed in the Skins tab, then right-click on the weapon in your player's inventory you want a skin applied to.

Skin List

  • ACAW - Scorched Desert
  • AK5D - Desert Camo, Green Camo, Warning Stripes, Urban Camo
  • AK74U - Gold
  • AKM - Desert Camo, Gray Tile, Urban Camo, Woodland Camo
  • AP85 - Silver
  • AKVal - Desert Camo, Urban Camo, Woodland Camo, Pixel Orange
  • AT-15 - Desert Camo, Urban Camo, Woodland Camo, Zebra Red
  • AUMP45 - White Skulls
  • Bulldog - Paint Splatter
  • Cleaver - Bloody
  • Crowbar - Bloody
  • Cx8 Storm - Urban Blue Camo
  • M9A1 - Tempered
  • M16 - Desert Camo, Woodland Camo
  • MAK10 - Desert Camo, Desert Camo1, Warning Stripes, Woodland Camo
  • Machete - Damascus
  • Makarov - Mud
  • DD-Mk18 - Gradient Pixel Blue, Gradient Pixel Red, Gradient Pixel Yellow
  • MP55 - Desert Camo, Urban Camo, Woodland Camo
  • P350 - Bronze
  • Pipe Wrench - Bloody
  • PX4 - Skulls
  • R90 - Scorched Earth
  • Hunting Rifle 85 - Desert Camo, Pixel Orange, Urban Camo, Woodland Camo
  • SAS12 - Desert Camo, Urban Camo, Warning Stripes, Woodland Camo

Exclusive Wallpapers

Enhance the look of your computer by using one of the 10 exclusive Miscreated wallpapers. The wallpapers are all captured at a 4K resolution, so they will look extra sharp!

Concept Artwork

View 30 pieces of concept art and inspiration boards that were used in the development of Miscreated. As an added bonus, the Iron Sons' logo is also included in PSD format, so you can use it to express your distaste for, and rise up against, the Amalgamated corporation.

Main Menu Theme Music

The Miscreated main menu theme music is included in MP3 format. The musical score was composed and performed by Anthony Casalena. Both the 1 minute short version and the full 10 minute looping versions are included.

Game Maps

8K resolution maps of both the islands and canyonlands levels. Print them out and post them on your wall!

categories.description: 已启用 Valve 反作弊保护
